ygData.subject: Re: Weapons of choice
ygData.msgSnippet: A combine weapon is a weapon though not really magic can hit targets that can only be hit by magic, they also tend to be lighter and have a shorter delay.  You
ygData.messageBody:
A combine weapon is a weapon though not really magic can hit targets that
can only be hit by magic, they also tend to be lighter and have a shorter
delay. You can buy them at two gypsy camps in Antonica, the first is in N.
Karana in the gypsy camp along the road by the gaurd tower, the second is
located in the Oasis of Marr, at the Northeastern corner of the Oasis
itself. You will pay 40+ pp for one but they are worth it, and...... You
dont have to stick em in the bank to keep them :).

Jaezebel Bladesong, Gypsy Bard of the 19th Stanza,
Innouruuk

-----Original Message-----

>unless i stick it in the bank. Any answer appreciated. If long email
